name: ImaginationCanvas
0:
”Alexa, open Imagination Canvas”
”Draw a square”
”Move the square left”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: imagination canvas
des: Not everyone can draw, but everyone has an imagination. This skill allows you to visualize your ideas and create vibrant scenes. Various commands are available to build onto a canvas using three basic shapes–a square, circle, and triangle. Having an Echo Show or Spot is recommended, but not required as the skill will also output the rendered canvas to the companion Alexa mobile app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
